Full Stack Software Engineer

Cyngn Mountain View, CA

About Cyngn

Based in Mountain View, CA, Cyngn is a publicly-traded autonomous technology company. We deploy self-driving industrial vehicles like forklifts and tuggers to factories, warehouses, and other facilities throughout North America. To build this emergent technology, we are looking for innovative, motivated, and experienced leaders to join us and move this field forward.

About This Role

Cyngn is building a cloud platform that helps customers monitor, manage, and optimize fleets of autonomous industrial vehicles in real time. As a Full Stack Engineer (Mid–Senior), you'll ship features end-to-end—from Python backend services to TypeScript/JavaScript frontends—on a small, high-impact team.

Responsibilities

  • Build customer-facing web experiences using TypeScript/JavaScript.
  • Build and evolve backend services in Python that power fleet operations.
  • Design and implement reliable APIs (REST and/or gRPC).
  • Deliver real-time features using WebSockets and event-driven patterns.
Qualifications

  • 2–4+ years of professional software engineering experience.
  • Strong production experience with Python and TypeScript or JavaScript.
  • You've shipped and supported user-facing web applications.
$153,000 - $171,000 a year

    Entry level
